Hero.title:
Cultivating living art
on your land
Hero.subtitle: Bespoke architectural landscapes where nature meets precision.
Hero.experience_desc: Acres of curated ecosystems across the globe.
Hero.approach_desc: We take on the full cycle of work: from soil analysis to subsequent garden care, guaranteeing a result that will exceed expectations.
Hero.approach_step1_desc: Study of terrain, insolation, and soil composition to create a sustainable ecosystem.
Hero.approach_step2_desc: Unique sketches and 3D visualization reflecting your character and lifestyle.
Hero.approach_step3_desc: Strict architectural supervision and work of experienced engineers at every stage.
Hero.approach_step4_desc: Professional care by gardeners so your garden flourishes every year.
Hero.service1_desc: Geoplastics and terrace creation for unique site geometry.
Hero.service2_desc: Smart Hunter and Rain Bird irrigation systems for lawn health.
Hero.service3_desc: Evening lighting scenarios for atmosphere and safety.
Hero.service4_desc: Instant effect of an adult garden with a survival guarantee.
Hero.service5_desc: Ponds, streams, fountains, and biopools for relaxation.
Hero.service6_desc: Gazebos, pergolas, benches, and art objects of individual design.
Hero.cta_desc: Leave a request for a free visit from a landscape architect. We will evaluate the potential of your territory and suggest ideas.

Footer.description: Pioneering the future of landscape architecture through ecological intelligence and minimalist design.
Footer.rights: Â© 2023 Terraform Landscapes. All rights reserved.

Services.title: Cultivating <sanctuary>Sanctuary</sanctuary>
Services.description: Where precision engineering meets organic artistry. We sculpt environments that breathe, enduring beyond the seasons.
Services.hardscaping_desc: Sculpting earth to create dimension. We manipulate topography to reveal hidden potentials.
Services.hydro_desc: Invisible infrastructure. Precision engineering that manages water flow seamlessly.
Services.lumination_desc: Atmospheric curation. We paint with light to extend beauty into the evening.
Services.greening_desc: Botanic curation focused on resilience. A living palette of texture and color.
Services.process_01_desc: Understanding the soul of the site and the desires of the dweller. We begin with deep listening.
Services.process_02_desc: Selecting materials that age gracefully. Every stone, light fixture, and sapling is chosen for permanence.
Services.process_03_desc: A meticulous installation process where precision meets the unpredictable nature of the wild.

Projects.description: We create bespoke landscapes that breathe. Explore our collection of award-winning sustainable gardens and outdoor living spaces.

Philosophy.description: Where nature's ancient wisdom meets architectural precision. We don't just design landscapes; we curate living ecosystems that breathe.
Philosophy.section2_desc: Our methodology goes beyond aesthetics. We employ scientific analysis to ensure every plant, stone, and water feature contributes to a self-sustaining biome.
Philosophy.eco_desc: We design closed-loop ecosystems where waste becomes nutrient. Our water retention landscapes capture 95% of rainfall, reducing irrigation needs and creating resilient micro-climates.
Philosophy.climatic_desc: Every species is chosen based on 50-year climate projections. We prioritize hyper-local natives that thrive in your specific soil chemistry and sun exposure without artificial life support.
Philosophy.cultivators_desc: Minds dedicated to the art of living architecture.
Philosophy.cta_desc: Let's discuss how we can transform your space into a sustainable legacy.

Contacts.title: Let's Cultivate Your <living_space>Living Space</living_space>
Contacts.description: Connect with our principal architects to discuss your vision for a sustainable, luxury outdoor living space. We bridge nature and modern architecture.
